attributes.action: lower the prices of non alcoholic drinks in pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: have you ever gone in to a pub and the prices of soft drinks is nearly the same price as a pint of beer this should not be, think when you take you family out and you pay nearly 10 pound just on a few soft drinks so by signing this e petition something might get done to reduce the prices on non alcoholic drinks so everyone can enjoy going out and might cut down on drink driving

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
